name: Bird couple🐦 3
detailed_description:
Bird couple 3 is a simple puzzle, where you need to open a couple of cards in such a way that both cards have the same image. One card always does not have a couple. In this game, beautiful birds hide under cards. The level switch is in the upper right hand corner and the number of errors is in the upper left corner. Find couple for each bird and train your memory! In this DLC, you get 25 new beautiful images of birds hiding under the cards.

- 3 difficulty levels
- all kinds of options on each of them
- pleasant music
- relaxing gameplay
- thematic achievements
- UHD (4K) resolution support (3840x2160 pixels)

As soon as possible:
- thematic trading cards
- thematic backgrounds
- thematic emoticons

short_description: Bird couple 3 is a simple puzzle, where you need to open a couple of cards in such a way that both cards have the same image. One card always does not have a couple. In this game, beautiful birds hide under cards.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Hungarian*, Greek*, Danish*, Traditional Chinese*, Simplified Chinese*, Korean*, Dutch*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese*, Romanian*, Russian*, Thai*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Finnish*, Czech*, Swedish*, Japanese*, Vietnamese*, Spanish - Latin America*

pc_requirements.minimum:
最低:
  • OS: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10
  • プロセッサー: Intel Celeron 1800 MHz
  • メモリー: 256 MB RAM
  • グラフィック: Intel HD Graphics
  • ストレージ: 512 MB 利用可能
pc_requirements.recommended:
推奨:
  • OS: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10
  • プロセッサー: Intel Core i3
  • メモリー: 512 MB RAM
  • グラフィック: Intel HD Graphics
  • ストレージ: 512 MB 利用可能
